title.en: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Sweet Encount

altTitles.ja: 勝利の女神：NIKKE すいーとえんかうんと

altTitles.ja-ro: Shouri no Megami: Nikke - Sweet Encount

altTitles.en: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Sweet Encounter

description.en:
In this manga, NIKKE and their friends live peacefully. A loose comedy in which the main character N102 works as a maid at a maid café called "Maid For You", where Cocoa and Soda work too!

The first official manga based on the popular mobile game *Goddess of Victory: NIKKE* with over 25 million downloads worldwide!
description.ja: この世界ではニケたちは平和に過ごす─。Nが、アニスが、ココアとソーダが働く「メイド･フォー・ユー」でメイドとして働くことに…！一生懸命働く姿やゲームではあまり見ることができない服装などに癒やされること間違いなし！

description.en:
"I only shine under your lens."

[Silent Yet Passionate X Luring]

Nan Mo, the top photographer in the country, having captured numerous internet celebrities and stars, still finds Jiang Yudai as her one and only obsession in her midnight dreams. Jiang Yudai became Grand Slam actress at the age of 18, and a decade later, she remains at the peak of popularity. She possesses an alluring, distant gaze and an untouchable, ethereal beauty. No one knows that behind the scenes, Jiang Yudai, under an online persona, she frequently expresses her love on Nan Mo's account, yearning for Nan Mo's lens to touch every inch of her body.

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.zh-hk: 從今天開始的青梅竹馬

altTitles.zh: 从今天开始的青梅竹马

altTitles.ja: 今日おさ

altTitles.vi: Bạn từ nhỏ kể từ ngày hôm nay

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)
description.es-la: Kaede Yuzuki siempre deseó tener un amigo de la infancia como en los mangas que lee. Cuando se mudó al lado de su compañero de clase, Kouhei Aida, él dijo que haría cualquier cosa para ayudarla. Entonces, ¡ella le pidió que fuera su amigo de la infancia! ¡Los dos tienen divertidas aventuras recreando todas las cosas que deberían hacer los amigos de la infancia!

altTitles.en: Miss Komi Is Bad at Communication.

altTitles.th: โฉมงามพูดไม่เก่งกับผองเพื่อนไม่เต็มเต็ง

altTitles.ja: 古見さんは、コミュ症です。

altTitles.vi: Komi - Nữ thần sợ giao tiếp

altTitles.pt: Senhora Komi não consegue se comunicar

altTitles.pt-br: Senhorita Komi não consegue se comunicar

altTitles.th: โฉมงามพูดไม่เก่งกับผองเพื่อนไม่เต็มเต็ง

altTitles.zh-hk: 古見同學有交流障礙症

altTitles.zh: 古见同学有交流障碍症

description.en:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
description.es: Hitohito Tadano acaba de empezar la secundaria alta anhelando que sea pura paz y tranquilidad, pero sus planes se truncan cuando termina sentado al lado de la perfecta Shoko Komi. Ella es linda, inteligente, educada y hasta huele bien. Pero tiene 0 dotes sociales y no sabe cómo corno comunicarse con los demás. Es ahí que Tadano se sube al pony y se propone ayudarla a su compañera hasta que se haga de cien amigos, y con suerte algo más.
description.pl: Komi-san jest piękną i godną podziwu dziewczyną, od której nikt nie może oderwać oczu. Prawie cała szkoła postrzega ją jako zimne piękno, które jest poza ich zasięgiem, ale Tadano Hitohito zna prawdę: młoda piękność po prostu źle komunikuje się z innymi. Komi-san, chce to zmienić, a ma jej w tym pomóc Tadano.
description.es-la: El viaje a 100 amigos comienza con una sola conversación. El mayor sueño de la estudiante de secundaria socialmente ansiosa Shouko Komi es hacer amigos, ¡pero todos en la escuela confunden su ansiedad social paralizante con una reserva fría! Con todo el cuerpo estudiantil manteniendo su distancia y Komi incapaz de pronunciar una sola palabra, la amistad podría estar siempre fuera de su alcance. Tadano Hitohito es un chico ordinario total, y así es como le gusta. Vive para mezclarse con el fondo. Todo eso cambia cuando se encuentra solo en un salón de clases el primer día de la escuela secundaria con la legendaria Komi. Rápidamente se da cuenta de que ella no es distante, sino que tiene problemas para comunicarse con los demás. ¡Ahora ha hecho su misión ayudarla en su búsqueda para hacer 100 amigos!
description.pt-br: Komi-san é uma bela e admirável garota que ninguém consegue tirar os olhos. Quase todos da escola a veem como alguém fora do alcance, mas Tadano Shigeo sabe a verdade: **ela apenas não sabe como se comunicar com os outras pessoas**. Komi-san, que deseja corrigir este mau hábito dela, tenta melhorar com a ajuda do Tadano-kun...

title.en: NEET Kunoichi to Nazeka Dousei Hajimemashita

altTitles.ja: ニートくノ一となぜか同棲はじめました

altTitles.en: Somehow, I Started Living with a NEET Kunoichi

description.en:
Otaku Kunoichi ≒ Otaku NEET ≒ Girl with Zero Romantic Experience!

A normal salaryman, Tsukasa, is attacked by a Youma and is gallantly saved by the appearance of the genius kunoichi, Shizuri. However, when she is not working, she becomes an otaku NEET... Today, Tsukasa's househusband skills will continue to spoil Shizuri. A prescription delivered directly to you♪
description.ja:
平凡なサラリーマン・政が妖魔に襲われていたところに颯爽と現れ、
彼を救った天才くノ一・しづり。しかし彼女は、オフにはオタクニートになってしまうのだった……。政の主夫スキルが、今もしづりを甘やかす！

title.en: The Snow Leopard Baby of the Black Leopard Family

description.en: A child, born a hybrid and abused to death by their grandfather, is reborn with memories of their past life. Faced with the same fate, they seek out their estranged father for protection until adulthood. Expecting rejection, they are instead met with love and acceptance from their father, siblings, and grandfather—who even offers them the family leadership.

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

altTitles.ja: キン肉マン

description.en:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.

altTitles.ja: おるちゅばんエビちゅ

description.en: A very unique, funny manga that follows the exploits of Ebichu, a talking female hamster with a dirty mind. This manga includes sexual dialogue, some nudity, and the occasional sex scene. There's also some violence against hamsters. It's all pretty lighthearted, but if any of this stuff offends you, don't read it.

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.
description.ja:
どんなつらい時でも、見ていてくれる「誰か」がいる。

この世に未練を残してさまよっていた幽霊は、ある日、仕事に疲れた会社員、野崎と出会う。

「俺のことなんて、誰も見てないんだ…」

孤独感に打ちひしがれる野崎。人生の最後に一人ぼっちだった幽霊は、彼の生活を見守ってみることに。仕事に翻弄されながらも必死に日々を送る野崎。やがて彼に新たな出会いが訪れる。忙しない日々の中でこぼれ落ちてしまった気持ちを、野崎は人との関わりの中で、少しずつ取り戻していく――。

altTitles.ja: パラレルパラダイス

altTitles.vi: Thiên đường song song tại dị giới

description.en: One day at school, Youta sees someone strange entering his school. Out of nowhere this being appears next to him and makes him fall from the 3rd floor. He lands in a strange world, where beings like dragons exist! Youta meets a young paladin, and discovers that he is the only man inhabiting that planet, and that its inhabitants are extremely 'weak' to his presence. Could this be paradise?
description.ja: 異世界に迷い込んだ男子高生・太多陽太は、森の中で美少女騎士・ルーミと出会う。そこは少女だけが存在する世界。神の化身からルーミとの交尾を命じられる陽太。触れられただけで極限まで発情したルーミは‥‥!?
description.es-la: “Por favor, apareate conmigo”. En un mundo extraño, Youta Tada es atacado por una hermosa chica caballero en celo. Solamente monstruos temidos y chicas hermosas viven en este mundo.¡El único hombre es Youta Tada! ¿¡Es esto el cielo o el infierno para Youta!?
description.pt-br: Em um dia na escola Youta vê alguém estranho entrando na escola, do nada este ser aparece ao seu lado e o joga do 3º andar! Porém ele vai parar em um mundo estranho, onde seres parecidos com dragões existem! Youta conhece uma jovem paladina, e descobre que é o único homem habitando aquele planeta, e que suas habitantes são extremamente ‘fracas’ a sua presença… seria este o paraíso?!

title.en: Dantoudai no Hanayome - Sekai wo Horobosu Futsutsuka na Tatsuki desu ga

altTitles.ja: 断頭台の花嫁 世界を滅ぼすふつつかな竜姫ですが。

altTitles.en: Bride on the Guillotine: The Dragon Princess Who Destroys the World

altTitles.es-la: La profecía de la princesa de la destrucción

description.en: A "dragon" appears from a container that fell in front of Dazai Ryunosuke's eyes. The disastrously beautiful "dragon," Rinne Irako, had been condemned to death as a world-destroying calamity, and was being transported to a place of refuge. Rinne Irako was sentenced to death and transported. But as fate would have it, the "dragon" girl had a miraculous encounter with a boy, and her destiny was about to change drastically.
description.ja: 世界を滅ぼす災厄とされ死刑判決を受けた伊良子燐音は、移送中の事故によって太宰龍之介と出逢うこととなる。人類滅亡を防ぐための方法はなんと……「伊良子燐音と太宰龍之介が【ケッコン】すること」!?
description.es-la: En un mundo al borde de la catástrofe, Ryuunosuke Dazai se convierte en el protagonista de una historia intrigante. Su encuentro con Rinne Irako, una figura deslumbrante y peligrosa, desencadena un giro de los acontecimientos. Rinne, condenada a muerte por su naturaleza caótica destinada a destruir el mundo, es trasladada bajo estricta seguridad. Sin embargo, un encuentro fortuito con Dazai despierta una chispa de esperanza en ambos. Juntos, se embarcan en una trascendental travesía para detener el cataclismo inminente y salvar la existencia. Enfrentando desafíos y sacrificios, descubren el poder del amor mutuo como su arma más poderosa contra la destrucción. Guiados por un propósito superior, se unen para proteger y preservar el mundo que aman, demostrando la capacidad humana de trascender la oscuridad y encontrar redención a través del amor.

title.en: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead

altTitles.en: Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead

altTitles.es-la: Me convertí en la sirvienta del protagonista de un juego de terror

description.en:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?

altTitles.ja: アエカナル

description.en: Sadai, looking for a place to die, headed deep into the mountains. There he encountered a mysterious and gentle girl who had lived alone in an abandoned village for 150 years, continuing to serve an intangible god. A man that had failed to die and a widow with a graceful aura — from the remains of their wasted lives, the two of them begin a new chapter of their story.

With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"
난데없는 사랑고백에 진땀이 빠지는 세영, 하지만 이건 시작에 불과했으니...
가까이 다가갈수록 반전의 모습을 보이는 그녀 '안세영'과
그 모습을 빈틈없이 파고 들려는 직진남 '남호열'의 줄다리기가 지금 시작된다!

altTitles.ja: 10月の花火

description.en:
After his first summer break in college, Taichi installs a dating app out of frustration at not having a girlfriend.
To his surprise, he matches with a woman he once saw crying at his summer beach job…

Source: MangaPlus
description.ru: После своего первого горького расставания в универе, преисполненный злостью на своё одиночество и отсутствие девушки Таити устанавливает приложение для знакомств. К своему удивлению, его мэтчит с девушкой, которую он когда-то увидел плачущей во время летней подработки на пляже...

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

altTitles.ja: 実は俺、最強でした？

altTitles.fr: Suis-je en fait le plus fort ?

altTitles.pt-br: Na Verdade, Eu Sou o Mais Forte?

altTitles.ru: На самом деле, я самый сильный?

altTitles.th: ผมเทพสุดจริงเหรอ?

altTitles.vi: Tôi Có Thực Sự Là Người Mạnh Nhất Không?

description.en:
To be reincarnated into another world with the promise of a "cheat" power is one thing... but to be reborn as a baby, and then left for dead after your royal parents think you're powerless? That's another thing entirely!

Now the newly-born Reinhart — or Hart to his new friends — must find his way through a dangerous world. But luckily, he's got magic that's quite literally off the charts!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10050/episode/322262) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/am-i-actually-the-strongest/)
description.ja: 赤ちゃんに転生したのに捨てられた！チート魔法力で生き延びろ！
description.pt:
Um NEET é renascido em outro mundo com a promessa de um avida pacifica. Apesar de ter nascido na realeza, devido a sua magica parecer fraca, seus pais o abandonaram sem pensar em uma floresta para ser devorado por monstros. Contudo sua magia é desumanamente poderosa. O que ele devera fazer para obter a vida pacifica que ele tanto deseja?

Hikikomori (引き篭り) é um termo que significa literalmente isolado em casa, ele é usado para referir-se a pessoas que apresentam graves níveis de isolamento, normalmente são jovens entre 13 e 39 anos que muitas vezes são sustentados pelos pais ou trabalham online. NEET é basicamente a mesma coisa mas tem suas diferenças."
description.ru: Парень перерождается в другой мир, чтобы иметь обещанную мирную жизнь. Ребенком его бросают в лесу за низкий уровень магии, который не может быть измерен современными радарами. Что ему нужно сделать, чтобы достичь мирной жизни, которую он так желает?
description.es-la: Un chico renace en otro mundo para tener una vida pacífica. Un bebé nacido de poder y realeza, abandonado en el bosque por tener un poder que no puede ser comparado ni por los radares modernos (no, no esta ni cerca de sobrepasar los 9000). ¿Qué hara para obtener la vida pacífica que él tanto desea?"
description.pt-br:
Reencarnar em outro mundo com a promessa de um poder de "trapaça" é uma coisa... mas renascer como um bebê e então ser deixado para morrer depois que seus pais reais acham que você é impotente? Isso é outra coisa completamente diferente!

Agora, o recém-nascido Reinhart — ou Hart para seus novos amigos — deve encontrar seu caminho através de um mundo perigoso. Mas, felizmente, ele tem uma magia que está literalmente fora dos gráficos!

description.en:
A man who has been reincarnated in a different world acquires the vocation of "pole master" in the new world! However, that special ability is not used to defeat enemies, nor to gain power, but to embrace the beautiful girls who appear one after another with all one's might! A unique story of conquering another world begins here!

The protagonist, “Sao” has been reborn with his memories from his past life. He’s born as a son of a rural villager, but his true identity is a reincarnated person with cheat abilities and the knowledge of the modern world. With the class “Rod Master,” he received as he grows up, and the many skills that came up with it, he can defeat enemies, help people, and even for sex.
description.id: Seorang pria yang telah bereinkarnasi di dunia lain memperoleh panggilan "master tongkat" di dunia baru!  Namun, kemampuan itu tidak digunakan untuk mengalahkan musuh, atau untuk mendapatkan kekuatan, melainkan untuk ngentot dengan gadis-gadis cantik yang terus muncul!
description.ja: ノクターンノベルズ大人気作！ 異世界転生したとある男は新天地で「竿師」なる天職を手にする！ だが、その異能は敵を倒すためでもなく、権力を手にするためでもなく、ただひたすらに全力で次々と現れる美少女を抱くことに使うのだ！ 異色の異世界制覇譚、ここに開幕！

altTitles.ja: 逃げ上手の若君

description.en: Yusei Matsui, creator of Assassination Classroom and Neuro: Supernatural Detective, is back! Set in feudal Japan in between the Kamakura and Muromachi periods, our hero Hojo Takatoki is a boy on the run that history all but forgot! When the Kamakura shogunate is overthrown by Ashikaga Takauji, Takatoki's family and standing are visciously taken away from him, and he must flee to the far reaches of the land to survive and seek out his revenge!
description.ru: Действие происходит в феодальной Японии между периодами Камакура и Муромати, наш герой Ходзе Такатоки - мальчик в бегах, о котором история почти забыла! Когда сегунат Камакура свергнут Асикагой Такаудзи, семья и положение Такатоки насильно отнимаются у него, и он должен бежать в дальние края страны, чтобы выжить и отомстить!

altTitles.ja: アオアシ

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

description.en:
One young salaryman, who adores his plug-in, hybrid car that uses both electricity and gasoline, had been using camping in it as an escape plan from everyday life. Suddenly, he finds himself transported to another world with his car!

He'll start his life anew in this different world!
description.ja: やさぐれて会社での評価も低いサラリーマン・大前現人（おおまえあらと）。仕事のミスが理由で車に乗って逃亡し、サービスエリアで車中泊して起きたら異世界へ転移してた！そこで出会ったケモミミ娘に仕事観で説教され逆切れした主人公の異世界での前途は如何に！？異世界でのサバイバルで鍛えられたメンタルで、現代日本での仕事で活かせるか！？リアルと異世界の行き来で生き直す！これはそんな物語です。

description.en: This story is about Ine and Shouzou, two pensioners well into their 80s who are mysteriously returned to their 20s one night.
description.es:
Shozo e Ine son una pareja de ancianos que dirigen una granja de manzanas en Aomori. Un día se despiertan y descubren que se han transformado en sus yo más jóvenes. El apuesto abuelo y la bella abuela se meten en líos.
Una comedia sobre una pareja bulliciosa y cariñosa, ¡en la que participan un apuesto abuelo y una hermosa abuela!
description.ja:
青森でリンゴ農家を営む老夫婦・正蔵とイネ。
ある日目覚めるとふたりは若い頃の姿になっていて！？
イケメンなじいさま＆美人なばあさまが巻き起こす、
お騒がせおしどり夫婦コメディ！

Una comedia sobre una pareja bulliciosa y cariñosa, ¡en la que participan un apuesto abuelo y una hermosa abuela!

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.tl: Inimbitahan si Shun sa Klab ng Uwian ni Naoki Satou, na kilala rin bilang "Chokki-chan". Kahit na tumanggi siya, napasama pa rin siya sa mga gawain ng klab sa medyo pilit na paraan! Isang romantikong komedya tungkol sa Klab ng Uwian na tampok ang isang hayskul na dalaga na mahilig maglibot at isang bagong estudyante sa hayskul na nawalan ng pangarap.
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.
description.pt-br: Shun foi convidado para o Clube vá-para casa por Naoki Satou, também conhecido como "Chokki-chan". Apesar de recusar, ele acaba se envolvendo de alguma forma nas atividades do clube! Uma comédia romântica do Clube vá-para casa apresentando uma colegial amante de desvios e um novo aluno do ensino médio que perdeu seu sonho.

altTitles.ja: ブルーロック

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

description.en: One day, the veterinary doctor Zeke is suddenly fired by the king, leaving him with no where to go but at a loss. However, after helping a divine beast, he is invited to the beast kingdom with excellent treatment. After, Zeke is banished, the kingdom begins to decline, but he begins living happily surrounded by cute animal-eared girls. From "Let's Become a Novelist"! The long-awaited comic adaptation of the hugely popular harem slow life packed with fluffy and cute animal-eared girls!!(Source: bookwalker)
description.ja: ある日突然国王からクビを宣告された獣ノ医師・ジークは、行く当てがなくなり途方に暮れるが、神獣を助けたことにより超好待遇で獣人国に招かれることになる。そしてジークを追放したことで衰退が始まる国を尻目に、ケモ耳美少女たちに囲まれた幸せな日々が始まるのであった――。「小説家になろう」発!もふもふ×ケモ耳美少女凝縮で大人気のハーレムスローライフが待望のコミカライズ!!

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

Is the terrible heartache caused by a distant lover? Or is it the ties and obsession that follow along, like love that won't come true...?

description.en: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!
description.fr:
Une légende raconte qu'un enfant extrêmement fort serait né d'une pêche et baptisé Momotarô. Lorsqu'il devint assez grand et puissant, ce valeureux guerrier aurait chassé les Oni qui pillaient les villages. Ce héros n'est pas une légende... Tout comme les Oni...
Leurs descendants sont encore parmi nous et la bataille opposait le clan Momotarô au clan des Oni fait rage ! Shiki est un jeune garçon, au sang chaud. Alors qu'il vient de se faire renvoyer de l'école, il prend conscience qu'il possède du sang de Oni. Le clan Momotarô le cherche et veut l'éliminer. la quête de liberté de Shiki et des autres Oni commence...
description.ja: 「お前は鬼の血を継いでいる……」　主人公・四季は自らの血に棲む者と出逢うことになる。
description.pt-br: Ichinose Shiki, um herdeiro do sangue de Oni, viveu toda a sua infância alheio a esse fato. No entanto, quando um homem desconhecido entra correndo em sua casa na tentativa de assassiná-lo, seu pai adotivo finalmente revela a verdade. Em um mundo onde Oni e Momotarou nunca puderam coexistir, junte-se a Ichinose em sua luta pelo poder e unificando as duas raças!

I didn’t expect that my plan to avoid trouble… would lead to even bigger trouble?! The tsundere "Vicious Princess" from the Archery Club, the "White Fox" who is adept at teasing, the "Flower of the Highlands" with straight black hair, and…a sister with a severe case of brocon! Could my youth romantic comedy be wrong as well too?!

As a vampire, it is her duty to hunt down demonic beings known as Shinma who have wandered into the human world and send them back to the Darkness. The new story begins with Miyu transferring to a certain middle school.

The Female Knight and the Beast-Eared Child

description.en: A different world where demons are rampant and murderous. Olivia, a female knight, lives with her apprentice Noah, an animal eared child. A tale of a master and apprentice growing up, adventuring and being healed by the strong bond between each other.
description.ja: 魔物が蔓延り殺伐とした異世界。女騎士オリビアは、弟子の獣人ノアと暮らしていた。強く生きる2人の絆に癒され、キュンとする師弟の成長冒険譚。

title.en: Dorei Senshi no Isekai Taneuma Seikatsu ~Mahou mo Bujutsu mo Saikyou Dashi Harem made!?~

altTitles.id: Kehidupan Budak Petarung Seks di Dunia lain

altTitles.ja: 奴隷戦士の異世界種馬生活 ～魔法も武術も最強だしハーレムまで！？～

altTitles.en: A Slave Warrior's Stallion Life in Another World - Both Magic and Martial Arts are the Strongest, and Even a Harem!?

description.en:
"Ryuu" is a former modern human reincarnated in another world. He is a slave in this new world. However, once the knowledge of his previous life was revived, his magic power is also awakened. He gained strength at a speed that was incomparable to other slaves, and he easily defeated strong opponents, becoming the strongest gladiator among slaves.

Ryuu is bought by the noble Juller. The Juller Family, who saw slaves as power, wanted to own a great slave. The first instruction given to Ryuu as a slave was to "seed" a beautiful female slave...!

I'm a Slaves but super free! This otherworldly fantasy, which starts from the lowest class but has an unlimited future, start with a BANG!
description.id: "Ryuu", mantan manusia modern yang bereinkarnasi di dunia lain. Dia adalah seorang budak di dunia ini. Namun, begitu pengetahuan tentang kehidupan sebelumnya dihidupkan kembali, kekuatan sihirnya juga ikut terbangun. Dia mendapatkan kekuatan dengan kecepatan yang tidak bisa dibandingkan dengan budak lain, dan dia dengan mudah mengalahkan lawan yang kuat, dan menjadi seorang gladiator terkuat di antara para budak. Saat itu, seseorang yang membeli Ryuu muncul. Dia adalah bangsawan Juller, Keluarga Juller, yang melihat budak sebagai kekuatan, ingin memiliki budak yang hebat. Dan instruksi pertama yang diberikan kepada Ryuu sebagai seorang budak adalah untuk "membenihi" seorang budak wanita yang cantik...!
description.ja:
異世界に転生した、元現代人の“リュー”。彼はこの世界では奴隷の身分だった。しかし前世の知識が蘇ったと同時に彼の魔力は覚醒する。他の奴隷とは比べものにならない速さで実力をつけ、いとも簡単に強敵を倒していく彼は、奴隷の中で剣闘士の道を駆け上がっていく。
そんなある時、リューを購入する者が現れた。それは、大貴族で名門のジュラー家。奴隷を力と見なすジュラー家には、優秀な奴隷を揃えたい考えがあった。
そして、リューに奴隷として下された最初の指示は、なんと美しい女奴隷への“種付け”だった……！
奴隷なのに超自由！？　最下層から始まるけど未来は無限大な異世界ファンタジー、堂々開幕！

description.en: Official Hetalia AU. "This world, although similar to the one we know of, is just slightly different. Data-wise, it's pretty much the same thing, just a lot more punk and grunge-like this time. 200 crowded districts, each with a unique culture and history of their own, each with a boss in charge, in a spinning circle of harmony and chaos. Yet a new disruption was about to arise."

altTitles.ja: マダム・プティ

description.en:
It's the 1920s and Mariko, age 16, is married to a man 30 years her senior. She is honestly happy 
to be his wife and really excited to board the Orient express in Turkey on their honeymoon trip. 
But her life takes a rapid turn when her husband is discovered dead after the first night on board… 
And that's only the start of Mariko's great adventure.

title.en: Kore kara Shiawase ni narimasu! Shiitagerare Reijou desu ga Tekitaikoku no Koushaku-sama ni Naze ka Dekiaisaretemasu

altTitles.ja: これから幸せになります！ 虐げられ令嬢ですが敵対国の公爵様に何故か溺愛されてます

description.en:
"It would be a shame to hide those eyes. You are so beautiful."

She spent her childhood in prison, despised as a "witch" by her family because of her "certain ability" and the color of her eyes. She was sold as a tool in the war, and even in the place where she was sold, she lost even the feeling of "sadness" during the days of being abhorred. After the war, she met Albert, a duke of a hostile country, while she did not know what would happen to her life. I thought I would be used again... but what was prepared for me was... I was prepared with clean clothes, a warm room, and kind words that said, "You are free to do as you please here." Why does he treat me so well?... There is a reason for the kindness from Albert--?
description.ja:
その瞳を隠すなんてもったいない。君はとても綺麗だ」

“ある能力”と瞳の色のせいで家族から「魔女」と蔑まされ、牢の中で幼少期を過ごしたセーラ。戦地での道具として売られ、売られた先でも忌み嫌われる日々に「悲しい」と思う気持ちさえも失っていた。終戦後、自分の命がどうなるのかもわからない中で、敵対国の公爵・アルバートに保護されることに。また利用される…そう思っていたのに彼からの施しは、優しくあたたかさに溢れていて――…。

altTitles.ja: ミルモでポン!
わがまま☆フェアリー ミルモでポン!

description.en:
"If you read a message to the east aloud while you pour hot chocolate into a cup, a fairy of love will appear to fulfill all your desires!" It says so on the heart on a cup that Kaede has just bought. Said and done! Mirumo has arrived to change her life!  
  
This manga series was awarded the 2003 Kodansha Manga Award and the 2004 Shogakukan Manga Award for children's manga.

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

altTitles.pl: Moja nowa dziewczyna nie jest człowiekiem?

altTitles.ja: ハーフサキュバスを拾った

altTitles.es-la: Llevando a casa una medio súcubo

altTitles.vi: Tôi nhặt về nhà một bán Succubus

description.en: Take a child half succubus and half human.
description.id: Mungut anak setengah succubus dan setengah Manusia

title.en: Promise In The Night of Fireworks

altTitles.th: คำสัญญาคืนดอกไม้ไฟ

altTitles.en: The Promise of The Fireworks Night

description.en: "Rin" a lonely girl waiting for someone who genuinely cares about her, finally meets "Toey".  Toey's cheerful and charming personality gradually transforms Rin's heart.

title.en: Josou Danshi wa Skirt wo Nugitai!

altTitles.ja: 女装男子はスカートを脱ぎたい！

altTitles.en: The Crossdressing Boy Wants to Take Off His Skirt

description.en: Uichiro, a junior high school boy, harbors a secret he cannot share with his childhood friend, Tama-chan. He has been cross-dressing for her because she has a phobia of men. This is a thrilling yet agonizing comedy about a boy who cross-dresses for the girl he loves!
description.ja:
男子中学生の宇一郎には、幼馴染のたまちゃんに言えないある秘密があった。
それは男性恐怖症である彼女のために「女の子を演じている」ということ。
想いを寄せる少女のために女装を続ける年頃男子のドキドキ悶絶コメディ！！

altTitles.ja: トナリノジイサン

description.en: Yuki, a girl living in a rural town, studies art with the goal of becoming a painter in the city. One day, her sister leaves the town to fulfill her own dreams. Yuki boards the train with her to see her off, but during the journey, she is struck by a strange phenomenon!? Is it reality or an illusion... A chilling horror.

altTitles.ja: ドラマクイン

description.en: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
description.id: Setelah menyelamatkan Bumi, para alien tinggal bersama manusia di Jepang. Nomamoto, seorang pekerja pabrik dengan bos alien yang kejam, suatu hari bertemu dengan Kitami, yang mengatakan bahwa keluarganya sendiri dibunuh oleh alien. Keduanya dengan cepat menjalin persahabatan, tetapi suatu hari Kitami melakukan hal yang tidak terpikirkan...
description.ja: <毎週月曜更新>宇宙人が地球を救ってから、人間と宇宙人が共に住むようになった日本。工場で宇宙人の上司にこき使われるノマモトは、家族を宇宙人に殺されたという北見と出会う。仲を深める2人だが、ある日北見がとんでもないことをしてしまい…
description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...
description.uk: Після порятунку Землі прибульцями, Японія стала спільним домом для них та людей. Номото, яка змушена терпіти знущання від свого боса-прибульця на заводі, зустрічає Кітамі, чиє серце розбите втратою сім'ї, вбитої прибульцями. Між ними виникає щира дружба, яка переходить до здійснення їх бажань... винищення всіх прибульців...
description.pt-br: Após salvar a Terra, os alienígenas passaram a viver com os humanos no Japão. Nomamoto, uma operária de fábrica com um chefe alienígena abusivo, um dia conhece Kitami, que conta que sua própria família foi morta por alienígenas. Os dois rapidamente formam uma amizade, mas um dia Kitami faz o impensável…

altTitles.ja: カッコウの許嫁

altTitles.th: รักอลวนคนสลับบ้าน

description.en: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé!
description.es: Una comedia romántica sobre Nagi yendo a una reunión con sus verdaderos padres, y sobre Erika, que está atormentada por un compromiso no deseado!
description.fr: Nagi est un élève sérieux passionné par ses études. Un jour, alors qu'il est en deuxième année, il découvre qu'il a été échangé à la naissance avec une fille. Espérant garder leurs enfants biologiques et adoptifs, leurs parents décident qu'ils vont se fiancer pour pouvoir rester en famille. Mais Nagi est déjà amoureux d'une autre fille...
description.it: Nagi Umino, studente al secondo anno di una prestigiosa scuola preparatoria, ha scoperto di essere un bambino scambiato alla nascita. Un giorno, mentre si sta dirigendo all'incontro con i suoi veri genitori, incontra Erika Amano, una strana ragazza promessa in sposa nonostante la giovane età. Rifiutando di sposarsi, costringe Nagi a far finta di essere il suo ragazzo per cercare di far desistere i genitori dall'idea del matrimonio. Nagi e Erika scopriranno di avere molto più in comune di quanto pensino!
description.ja: 赤ちゃんの頃に取り違えられ、今は名門私立に通う高校 2年の海野凪。ある日、これから許嫁に会いにいくという超お嬢様女子高生・天野エリカと偶然出会い、彼氏のフリをしてくれと半ば強引に頼まれてしまう。だが、その時の二人は知る由もなかった。エリカは凪と取り違えられた子どもで、凪はエリカの許嫁相手だということを……。
description.ru: Романтическая комедия о Наги, идущем на встречу со своими настоящими родителями, и о Эрике, которая мучается из-за нежеланной помолвки!..
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica sobre Nagi que está indo se encontrar com seus verdadeiros pais e sobre Erika, que é atormentada por um casamento indesejado!

altTitles.th: ก้าวแรกสู่สังเวียน

altTitles.ja: はじめの一歩

description.en:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
description.pt-br: Ippo Makunouchi, um tímido estudante de ensino médio, é um dia salvo se der espancado, por Takamura, um boxeador. Encantado pelas habilidade de Takamura e por vídeos de boxe, Ippo decide enfrentar o mundo profissional do boxe!

title.en: The Demon Maid Only Wants to Be Bullied by the Villainess Noble Lady

altTitles.zh: 恶魔女仆只想被恶役千金欺负

altTitles.zh-ro: Èmó nǚpū zhǐ xiǎng bèi è yì qiānjīn qīfù

altTitles.en: The Demon Maid Only Wants to Be Bullied by the Villainess

description.en:
The Noble Lady binds Tentacle Maid

Sharan, a pious girl, has secured a well-paying job as a maid. Her mission is to serve a prideful, sadistic noble lady named Lynette. However, her job won't simply be that easy....

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ja: この世界において魔法とは生き物である。そして困難な試練を乗り越え、魔法を習得するハンターたちを人は「魔女」と呼ぶ。ある日、辺境の山奥で恐るべき王の魔法（キング・ウロロ）と最強の魔女が激闘を繰り広げていた。しかしそこへ、場違いな一人の少年が乱入する。彼の名はイチ。魔女とも魔法とも縁の無い山暮らしの狩人が世界の常識をひっくり返す！
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

altTitles.ja: 不滅のあなたへ

altTitles.th: แด่เธอผู้เป็นนิรันดร์

description.en:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

**Links:**  
**Officially Translated:**   
- Alternative English version by [K MANGA](<https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10076/episode/319887>)
- Alternative English version by [Inkr Comics](<https://inkr.page.link/Hmgv5BX51rftn9ar5>)
- In French by [Pika](<https://www.pika.fr/serie/your-eternity>)   
- In Italian by [Star Comics](<https://www.starcomics.com/fumetto.aspx?Fumetto=281315>)   
- In Polish by [Kotori](<http://kotori.pl/nasze-wydania/ku-twej-wiecznosci/>)   
- In Russian by [Istari](<https://istaricomics.com/katalog-knig/manga/istari-comics/to-your-eternity/>)   
- In German by [Egmont](<https://www.egmont-shop.de/to-your-eternity-01.html>)   
- In Indonesian by [m&c!](<http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/untukmu-yang-abadi-01>) as **Untukmu yang Abadi** (2019)
- In Brazilian Portuguese by [NewPOP](<https://www.lojanewpop.com.br/uma-vida-imortal-to-your-eternity-15576289>)
description.fr:
"C'est à l'épreuve de la réalité que je saurai ce que je suis... Voilà pourquoi mon voyage commence."

Un être sous forme d'une petite sphère est envoyé sur terre, celle-ci change d'apparence en fonction de ce qu'elle rencontre.
Elle rencontre d'abord un loup puis un jeune garçon vivant seul au milieu d'un paysage enneigé. Chaque nouvelle rencontre est une occasion de vivre de nouvelles expérience pour cet être. Ainsi commence le voyage de l'Immortel, un voyage fait d'expériences et de rencontres dans un monde implacable...
description.ja: 『聲の形』の大今良時が贈る、永遠の旅。真っ白な魂で世界に降り立つ！──現実だけが自分が誰なのかを教えてくれる。だから僕は、旅に出る。
description.ru: Отправленное на землю бессмертное существо знакомится с мальчиком, одиноко живущим в Тундре. Существо может принимать форму умерших, но только если «импульс» сильнее предыдущего. С какими впечатлениями и встречами столкнётся существо, живущее вечно?
description.pt-br:
Um ser imortal foi enviado à superfície da terra e encontrou um menino que vivia sozinho no meio da tundra.
O ser pode assumir a forma de coisas moribundas, mas somente se o "ímpeto" for mais forte que o anterior. Que tipo de experiências e encontros o ser encontrará enquanto viver para sempre?

---
- **Ganhou o 43º Prêmio Kodansha Manga na categoria shounen em 2019**

altTitles.ja: 和歌ちゃんは今日もあざとい

altTitles.en: A Hidden Side to my Crush

altTitles.pt-br: O lado oculto da minha Crush

description.en: Tomoya is a college freshman on a mission to finally get his first ever girlfriend, but with one small problem: he's still a virgin! While he's gotten close with the beautiful and charming girl Waka Sakuraba in his club at school, he can't wrack up the courage to take the first step and ask her out. One day, Tomoya stumbles upon a hidden side to his crush Waka...
description.ja:
彼女を作ろうと意気込むDT（童貞）な大学１年生・友哉。同じサークルの癒やし系美少女・桜庭和歌と親しくなるものの、勇気が出ずなかなか第一歩を踏み出せずにいた。
そんなある日、友哉は和歌の「別の一面」を目撃してしまい…？

title.en: Blue Archive - Problem Solver 68 Business Diary

altTitles.ja: ブルーアーカイブ 便利屋68業務日誌

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive: Nhật kí nghiệp vụ của Handyman 68

description.en: From the smash hit smartphone game "Blue Archive" comes the debut of Problem Solver 68 as our protagonist in this spin-off comic!! Please enjoy the comedic story of our four Problem Solvers in Kivotos - The Academic City!
description.ja: 大人気スマホゲーム『ブルーアーカイブ』から、「便利屋68」を主役としたスピンオフコミックが登場!! 学園都市キヴォトスを舞台に便利屋の4人が巻き起こすドタバタ劇をお楽しみください！
description.vi: Từ trò chơi dành cho smartphone đang nổi tiếng hiện nay "Blue Archive" chào đón sự xuất hiện dưới tư cách nhân vật chính của câu lạc bộ "Handyman 68 (Công ty Dịch vụ giúp việc số 68)" trong bộ manga ngoại truyện này!! Hãy cùng thưởng thức câu chuyện hài hước của bốn cô gái chạy vặt ở Thành phố Học viện Kivotos nào!
